name: The Millennium Bug DVD
description:
All DVDs will be personally autographed by the director! Price includes shipping!

SYNOPSIS: When the Haskin family seeks refuge from Y2K hysteria in the isolated forests of the Sierra Diablos mountains, madness and terror find them there. Abducted by a vicious hillbilly clan, the Haskins fight for survival, but neither they nor the hillbilly Crawfords can comprehend the monstrous nightmare about to erupt from the bowels of the earth.

name: Millennium Bug T-Shirt (black)
description:
The officially officiated Millennium Bug T-shirt! Black to limit evidence of accumulated filth. Non-wordy design for maximum minimalism! Tell people about the film when you wear it! Tell people about the film when you don't!

Comes in any color as long as it's black.

name: Millennium Bug "Official" Poster
description:
First it was the "Tick." But then came the "girl" (oh behave!). Get your official Millennium Bug poster (framed or non-framed) to fill that blank space on the wall of your man cave, simply by buying it. We'll ship it to you and everything! And remember, all official sales of official MBug merchandise officially go toward the official marketing budget! So buy much and buy often!


Size: 11x17

name: Millennium Bug "Tick" Poster
description:
The Millennium Bug "Tick" poster! The "tick" is the original concept for the poster and was used as the teaser image. It was later superseded by the official "girl" poster which, by the way, you can purchase too! Can't decide which you like more? Don't! Get them both (framed or non-framed) and help fund our marketing budget!

Size: 11x17

options.name: Get it framed for only $10 more!

name: Millennium Bug Mug
description: Start your day with a cup of Joe served in this official "Bug Mug." This mug has been scientifically designed to hold literally any fluid in existence! We at The Squire Film Shoppe suggest you fill the mug with non-toxic fluids but we release you to your own recognizance.
